title: From Poker Amateur To World Series Competitor In 'The Noble Hustle'
teaser: Colson Whitehead's book, now out in paperback, was born of an assignment to write about the World Series of Poker. It's a sharp observational tale of poker: those who play it and how it changed him.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
